name: generate-secrets
description: Generate secret variables for the strings specified based on the secret preferences

scripts.task:secret-for-strings: pushd "tasks/secrets-for-strings/secrets-for-stringsV1" && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && popd
scripts.task:publish-secrets-to-kv: pushd "tasks/publish-secrets-to-kv/publish-secrets-to-kvV1" && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && popd
scripts.task:azure-lock-unlock: pushd "tasks/azure-lock-unlock/azure-lock-unlockV1" && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && popd
scripts.init: npm install && npm run task:secret-for-strings && npm run task:publish-secrets-to-kv && npm run task:azure-lock-unlock
scripts.copy: npm run clean-dist && copyfiles "./tasks/**/!(*.ts|*.js.map|package-lock.json)" dist && copyfiles vss-extension.json LICENSE *.md dist && copyfiles images/**/* dist

author: onlyutkarsh
